title: 306.64 REAL ESTATE, WHEN SOLD.
text: Any public cemetery corporation incorporated under state law before or after April 23, 1913, that has acquired more than 100 acres of land may sell and convey, for other than burial or cemetery purposes, any real estate in excess of that 100 acres. The sale must not include land in which any interments have been made. Any sale must be approved by the unanimous vote of all the trustees of the corporation.
